name: web-submit-diyaccounting-co-uk
description: Submit UK tax information to HMRC

scripts.cdk:synth-environment: cd cdk-environment && npx dotenv -e ../.env -- npx dotenv -e ../.env.${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod} -- npx cdk synth --require-approval never --ci true --strict --validation --exclusively ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-env-ObservabilityStack ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-env-DataStack ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-env-IdentityStack ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-env-ApexStack && cd ..
scripts.cdk:synth-application: cd cdk-application && npx dotenv -e ../.env -- npx dotenv -e ../.env.${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod} -- npx cdk synth --require-approval never --ci true --strict --validation --exclusively ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-app-DevStack ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-app-AuthStack ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-app-HmrcStack ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-app-AccountStack ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-app-ApiStack ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-app-OpsStack ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-app-SelfDestructStack && cd ..
scripts.cdk:synth-delivery: cd cdk-delivery    && npx dotenv -e ../.env -- npx dotenv -e ../.env.${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod} -- npx cdk synth --require-approval never --ci true --strict --validation --exclusively ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-del-EdgeStack ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-del-PublishStack ${ENVIRONMENT_NAME:-prod}-del-SelfDestructStack && cd ..
scripts.cdk: ./mvnw clean verify -DskipTests && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=prod npm run cdk:synth-environment && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=prod npm run cdk:synth-application && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=prod HTTP_API_URL=https://package.json/script/ npm run cdk:synth-delivery && npm run clean && ./mvnw clean compile -DskipTests
scripts.cdk-ci: ./mvnw clean verify -DskipTests && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=ci   npm run cdk:synth-environment && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=ci   npm run cdk:synth-application && ENVIRONMENT_NAME=ci   HTTP_API_URL=https://package.json/script/ npm run cdk:synth-delivery && npm run clean && ./mvnw clean compile -DskipTests
scripts.test:all: vitest --run app/unit-tests/*.test.js app/integration-tests/*.test.js app/system-tests/*.test.js web/unit-tests/*.test.js && npm run test:browser && npm run test:behaviour
scripts.proxy: npx dotenv -e .env.proxy -- npx ngrok http --pooling-enabled --url wanted-finally-anteater.ngrok-free.app
scripts.auth: npx dotenv -e .env.proxy -- docker run -p 8080:8080 -e JSON_CONFIG_PATH=/config/mock-oauth2-config.json -e LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG -v $(pwd)/mock-oauth2-config.json:/config/mock-oauth2-config.json:ro ghcr.io/navikt/mock-oauth2-server:2.2.1
